value:
A gift for the winter festival? Umm...
I could always use a good pillow or
three, I guess...

*yawn* The kids are having so much
fun. I hope they'll still remember this
day after they've grown up.

My regular outfit isn't warm enough
for this weather. Are these fluffy bits
supposed to help with the cold?

I've been trying to think of a gift for
Peony, but she's the kind who always
says she'd be happy with anything...

I've got a bunch of presents for the
kids. This almost feels like handing
out dreams.

*yaaawn* H-huh? Wait, isn't this
$Nf's castle?$k$pIs there a winter festival going on
here as well? How strange...

Here you go! Yes, even our foes get
presents during the winter festival.
Sweet dreams!

Ahhh... I bet I'd have a wonderful
dream if I warmed myself up by the
fireplace for a while.

It's too hard to doze off in the cold.
Somebody find me a blanket...
Oh, I get a present too? Thank you!

*yawn* I'm Mirabilis. I have some
gifts to deliver, but...*yaaawn*...I think
I'm going to catch a few winks first.

Hello. I just finished...*yawn*...handing
out gifts to everyone. To be honest,
it was pretty hard at first.$k$pI was so cold that I could barely even
move, and my eyelids felt so heavy...
But something strange happened.$k$pAs I handed out gifts, I felt warmer
and warmer. Before I even realized it,
I'd given them all away!$k$pThis festival feels like a dream, one
where everyone is smiling and able to
enjoy each other's company.$k$pIf you asked me to describe a
daydream...I think this is how I would
do it. This moment right here.$k$pI know this season is special, and that
it cannot last forever...but I hope we
can feel like this all year round!
えいやぁ
あげますぅ
ひゃああっ！
うひぃ…
Yay, festival...
A gift for you...
Are we having fun yet?
Nap time...
I'll just...rest here...
Ehehee...
*yawn* So sleepy...
Stay warm...
It's cold all of a sudden! How long was I out?!
Delivering gifts just sounds...so tiring...
I get why they call it a snowbed. Looks comfy...
*yawn* Mother... Father... Isn't the festival nice?
I don't need any gifts... I'm just glad we're friends.
Mhm?
Got a plan?
So chilly...
